com.wx.util.representables.string

Class NullSafeCaster<InType,OutType>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.wx.util.representables.string.NullSafeCaster<InType,OutType>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TypeCaster<InType,OutType>

    public class NullSafeCaster<InType,OutType>
extends java.lang.Object
implements TypeCaster<InType,OutType>
    This is class wraps another caster ensuring that no null value is ever passed to the sub caster (but directly returns null instead). This can be useful if you want to enforce a caster that does not support null values to support them.
